name: Scottish Shortbread
steps: In a large bowl combine all shortbread ingredients; with fork, stir together until soft dough forms.
Press evenly on bottom of 2 (9-inch) pie pans.
In small bowl, stir together topping ingredients; sprinkle over shortbread.
Score each into 8 wedges; pierce all over with fork.
Bake for 20 to 30 minutes or until light golden brown.
Cut into wedges while still warm; cool on wire rack.
